descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Immanuel Quickley attempts a floater in the lane and misses but gets his own rebound for a putback and his first NBA basket.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Quickley scores first NBA basket) 2020/12/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: Quickley scores first NBA basket

videos.description: R.J. Barrett's pass to Obi Toppin gets away but finds Julius Randle at the top of the key who drills a 3-pointer as the buzzer sounds.
videos.headline: Julius Randle hits buzzer-beater 3

videos.description: The Pistons' Killian Hayes continues to draw the defense inside which leaves Josh Jackson open to knock down a 3-point shot within minutes of each other.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Highlights (Hayes finds Jackson twice for 3-point buckets) 2020/12/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: Hayes finds Jackson twice for 3-point buckets

videos.description: R.J. Barrett drives to the basket and slams down a one-handed dunk with authority.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Barrett drives for power slam) 2020/12/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: Barrett drives for power slam
